short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically detect and translate all arabic text written in '3awalem' notation to regular arabic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"3awalem" is an old arabic notation for obfuscating text that was used in the streets of the arab world! Long dead, it has only been recently resurrected by public attention.

If you find "3awalem" to be sucking your joy out of the internet, or you find yourself unable to comprehend it, or you just want to have fun and brag that you can read it really quickly while everyone else has to suffer, this extension is for you!

3awalem To Human Translator will scan all the text on your webpage and detect arabic text written in "3awalem", 3awalem To Human Translator will then de-obfuscate the text for you and place it back on the webpage transparently.
